overview: Michelle Martine is a beautiful, rich, sophisticated, but sexually na√Øve woman.  Her husband is more interested in business than his stunning wife.  Michelle spends most of her time in a health spa toning her phenomenal body.  When her husband leaves for a three day trip to Asia, she temporarily joins the stable of a high class pimp she has met through an acquaintance at the spa.
title: The Joy of Letting Go
